item.title: Go Installation Guide
item.description: Go Installation Guide Linux Installing Go with apt Install the Go compiler. 1 sudo apt install gccgo What is gccgo? Go compiler, based on the GCC back-end. This is the GNU Go compiler, which compiles Go on platforms supported by the gcc compiler. It uses the gcc backend to generate optimized code. Install the gc compiler. 1 sudo apt install gccgo-go What is gccgo-go? Go is a tool for managing Go source code (man gccgo-go).
